segments.text: Is there anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I have my wallet stolen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know the exact time . Maybe I lost it last night when I was traveling on the bus .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you make a description of your wallet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a black leather one.There are my credit card and ID and some money .
segments.speaker: S2
